name: Only one Line
description:
Only one line is a programming game where you program a robot that is so optimist it can only hold 1 line of code.

This game was made for the game makers toolkit game jam. With the theme 'only one'.

Good luck and have fun.

Credits:

  • Code - I
  • Ard - I and Buch from open game art https://opengameart.org/users/buch
  • Music - PlayOnLoop.com

PS. Windows and Mac versions untested
